name: treatment of used diesel-electric generating set, 18.5kW | used diesel-electric generating set, 18.5kW | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/12637/documentation

This dataset represents the treatment of used diesel-electric generating set.

The activity starts when the used diesel-electric generating set enters the waste treatment facility.

The data on energy needed during dismantling are unknown. 

The activity ends by different waste materials being ready for further treatment.
category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/383:Materials recovery/3830:Materials recovery
